mapper.insert: insert into questions( user_id, user_nick, host_space_id, question_content ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_nick}, #{host_space_id}, #{question_content} )
mapper.select: select q.question_id, q.user_id, q.user_nick, q.host_space_id, q.question_content, q.created_at from questions q where q.host_space_id = #{host_space_id}
